content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_STTransactionsSummary') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STTransactionsSummary
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STTransactionsSummary (
[sap_transactionsline_acctcode] nvarchar(4000),
[sap_transactionsheader_postingdate] date,
[sap_transactionsline_subdepotcode] nvarchar(4000),
[sap_transactionsline_doccat] nvarchar(4000),
[sap_transactionsline_linetotal] numeric(18,2),
[sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinal] numeric(18,2),
)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/FINANCE/sttransactionssummary.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	);

GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.T_STTransactionsSummary 
GO
